mapper.select: select count(*) from pla_work_order where dr = 0

select id, order_no, source, work_order_status, title, contact_email, remark, created_time from pla_work_order where dr = 0
order by created_time desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}

select workorder.id, workorder.order_no, workorder.source, workorder.work_order_status, workorder.title, workorder.contact_email, workorder.remark, workorder.annex_picture_1, workorder.annex_picture_2, workorder.annex_picture_3, user.LOGIN_NAME AS createdByName from pla_work_order workorder left join pla_user user on user.id = workorder.created_by where workorder.dr = 0 and workorder.id = #{enter.id}

select log.message_type, log.remark, log.created_time, user.LOGIN_NAME AS createdByName from pla_work_order_log log left join pla_user user on user.id = log.created_by where log.dr = 0 and log.work_order_id = #{workOrderId}
